type.description: The type of the input item. Always `input_image`.

anyOf.description: The URL of the image to be sent to the model. A fully qualified URL or base64 encoded image in a data URL.
The ID of the file to be sent to the model.

detail.description: The detail level of the image to be sent to the model. One of `high`, `low`, or `auto`. Defaults to `auto`.

title: Input image
description: An image input to the model. Learn about [image inputs](/docs/guides/vision).
